article.title: Northrop Grumman to Provide Unattended Ground Sensor Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Administration, Cincinnati, Ohio, was awarded a $20 million firm-fixed-price and cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the services in support of the unattended ground sensor systems.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Adelphi, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
